extendedInfo.description: Simple manual1. Start to play2. Level 1 : Touch the character in screen3. Level 2 : Donât touch the character in Level 1 screen. Please touch NEW one.4. Level 3~ : Touch another NEW one.=========================How far can you remember? The real measuring memory game! TouchMemorizer comes! Donât be upset for the result you canât believe.. You can reach the level of GOD by endless practice of âTouchMemorizer' # # Prior to use .. # # - This application is supported from the android 2.2 or higher.- Upto 20 level play and a few skins limits in lite version.## How to play 1. On the title screen (â¶) button to start the game. 2. Open your eyes. Make your head empty! 3. Find and touch the new spot in your screen 4. As level is up, the new spot keeps appearing. Don't be confused and find out new one! 5. If you touch the wrong spot, game will be over. And you'll see your memory level. 6. Your result is recorded in local rankings. And you can boast your record through Openfeint. 7. 20 achievements are provided in Openfeint. Let's challenge and clear all! Achievements will be updated continuously. #. bug / Q&A -Email: appstore@broadcon.co.kr-Homepage: www.broadcon.net-Twitter: @broadcon-Facebook: www.facebook.com/broadconhc
